nome_articolo: Bandai Dragon Ball Z Super Saiyan Son Goku Trail Of Battles Figuarts Zero (Statua)
descrizione: Ispirata alla bellissima illustrazione in cui Goku affronta i suoi più grandi nemici, ecco la nuova Figuarts Zero di Tamashii Nations dedicata al mondo di Dragon Ball Z! Non solo Super Saiyan Son Goku, ma anche Piccolo, Frieza e Cell prendono vita in questa fantastica scultura!

nome_articolo: DAMTOYS Platoon Staff Sergeant Barnes 1/6 (Action Figure)
descrizione:
The 1/6th scale Staff Sergeant Barnes Collectible Figure features:
Newly sculpted head with authentic likeness of  the character.
Approximately 30 cm tall
DAM 3.5 body with over 30 points of articulation
Two (2) pairs of interchangeable forearms:
- One (1) pair with fixed dynamic hands
- One (1) pair with wrist joints
Highly detailed hair sculpt
Head sculpt includes a separate rolling eyeball system
Movie-accurate facial expression with detailed  realistic skin texture
Five (5) interchangeable hands:
One (1) relaxed right hand
One (1) pair for holding rifle/ pistol
One (1) pair for gripping
Each piece of head sculpt is individually hand-painted for maximum realism

Costume:
Tropical Combat Uniform (TCU) jacket 3rd pattern
Tropical Combat Uniform (TCU) pants 3rd pattern
TCU belt
Olive drab T-shirt
Pistol belt
Suspenders
Ammo pouches  2nd pattern X2
1 Quart canteen cover X2
First Aid / Compass Case 2nd pattern
Jungle first aid kit pouch
Pistol holster (Genuine Leather)
Knife sheath (Genuine Leather)
1 Pair of jungle boots (Genuine Leather)
ARVN rucksack
tool shovel with shovel cover
M1 helmet with mitchell camo cover

Weapons:
CAR-15 carbine with dual magazine and rifle sling
Ammo bandolier with 7 magazines
Pistol
Grenade X4
Combat knife
Combat push dagger with sheath

Accessories:
Watch
Bracelet
Carabiner
Earth Figure stand
